      • priceForPlace

        public static int priceForPlace(int[] HardwareStore,
                                int[] quantity,
                                int location)
        Generate the final price to pay at each store with the work cost included
        pre: The total variable must already be initialized.
        post: Calculates the final price to pay for each store with the work cost included
        Parameters:
        HarwareStore - Store prices. HardwareStore[i] >= 0
        quantity - Amount of each material. quantity[i] > 0
        location - Number that indicates the location of the property. 3=>location>=1

      • bestPrice

        public static int[] bestPrice(int[] HC,
                              int[] FC,
                              int[] FB)
        Generates an array with the best prices among the three stores.
        pre: The array for the best prices must already be intialized.
        post: Return the list with the best prices.
        Parameters:
        HC - Prices for HomeCenter. HC[i]>=0
        FC - Prices for la ferreteria del centro. FC[i]>=0
        FB - Prices for la ferretreria del barrio. FB[i]>=0

      • bestIndex

        public static int[] bestIndex(int[] HC,
                              int[] FC,
                              int[] FB)
        Generates an array with the index of the store with the best price for each material.
        pre: The array for the best prices store index must be already intialized.
        post: Returns the array with the index for the store with the best prices.
        Parameters:
        HC - Prices for HomeCenter. HC[i]>=0
        FC - Prices for la ferreteria del centro. FC[i]>=0
        FB - Prices for la ferretreria del barrio. FB[i]>=0

      • finalPrice

        public static int finalPrice(int[] bestPrices,
                             int[] quantity,
                             int location)
        Generates the final cost of the products including the delivery.
        pre: The variable for the final price must be already initialized.
        post: Returns the cost of the products and it's delivery.
        Parameters:
        bestPrices - List of the best prices among the 3 stores. bestPrices[i]>=0
        quantity - List with the amount needed of each material. quantity[i]>0
        location - Integer that indicates the location of the property. 3>=location>=1
